**Fabrication of the MHN**
The MHN was fabricated on a printed circuit board \(PCB).
The synapse consists of a memristor, a resistor, an inverter and a transmission gate.
Positive or negative synaptic weight can be obtained by electronic switches.
In the 3-bit MHN, a neuron consists of three synapses.
A neuron was constructed with an operational amplifier to
Obtain the sum of the three inputs.
The state of the neuron was stored on a capacitor.
The fabrication procedure of the MHN is as follows:
